receipt  Sold out!

DevFest Nantes 2016

November 9th & 10th 2016 at "La cité des Congrès", Nantes, France


event  Add to the calendar


DevFest 2016 is the 5th edition of an event with top of the line Talks on Android, AppEngine, Angular, Chrome, HTML5, Docker...It is a unique opportunity to learn, share news and information about Web Technologies, Cloud, Mobile Tech and the Internet of Things.

1000+

Attendees

Developers, Architects, CTO, Product managers...

50+

Sessions

Talks, quickies, hand's on, debate...

50+

Speakers

French and from all over the world

4

Tracks

IoT & Mobile, Web, Cloud & BigData, Discovery

What to expect ?

Unique Conferences

More than 50 conferences recorded around 4 themes : Web, Cloud & BigData, IoT & Mobile, Discovery.

Developer focus

Want to learn by the code ? Hand's on are a great opportunity to test and try technology with an expert

Innovation

Demonstrations and disruptive products proposed by our partners and sponsors.

The perfect place for you
Cité des Congrès, Nantes

Located in the center of Nantes, the event takes place in the "Cité des Congrès" with more than 1000m² of conference rooms, hand's on and networking space...

Tickets

Standard

This pass is available with 2 forms:

  • An access for one day at 40€,
  • An access for both days at 70€.

With this pass, you get:

  • An access to all the conferences,
  • The lunch as a complete buffet,
  • The After party (only for the attendees of wednesday 9th).
* By you subscription, you allow the GDG to use and publish the photos taken during the event without time limit.
Buy chevron_right

Reduced Price

This pass reduced price is accessible from 10€ and includes all the "standard pass" elements for one day, this ticket is subject to the following conditions:

  • Student or University
  • or looking for a job, unemployed

Proof will be request to retrieve your badge.

To assist to both days, you need to buy 2 tickets.

Buy chevron_right
